pageTitle: M Missoni Ribbed Knit Gown | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Italian sizes. Sizes listed are Size & Fit Length: 60in / 152.5cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Made in Italy. Dry clean. Lining: 100% polyester. Shell: 79% cotton/18% nylon/3% elastane. Fabric: Lightweight slinky jersey. Delicate ivory jersey is coaxed into lovely, elegant textures throughout this exquisite M Missoni gown, lending a modern feel to a classically romantic piece. The scalloped V neckline flatters the shoulders, and the fitted bodice is accented with slender, sheer bands along the bust and waist. The ribbed skirt falls to a floor-grazing hem with scalloped and sheer detailing, and wide straps crisscross the back for a sweet finish. Mini dress lining. Description Maxi > Dresses > Clothing >
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer The Italian fashion house Missoni was founded in 1953 by husband and wife Tai and Rosita Missoni. Their colorful Missoni knitwear soon garnered international recognition and a global luxury lifestyle brand was born. Today, daughter Angela acts as the creative force, and the line M Missoni is dedicated to a younger, sophisticated woman. Boldly layered sweaters and scarves are the hallmark of M Missoni collections: mix-and-match pieces designed to be worn around the clock and reinvented season after season. Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free.
